name.baseName: Natural gas development planning | KLS tectonic belt | Stochastic simulation
天然气开发规划| KLS构造带|随机模拟

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Risk assessment of natural gas development planning scheme needs a lot of stochastic simulation, which must be realized by computer. Therefore, based on the risk assessment theory of natural gas development planning scheme, an evaluation software is developed, and its application research is carried out with the help of the software
天然气开发规划方案风险评价需要进行大量的随机模拟，必须借助计算机实现，为此基于天然气开发规划方案风险评价理论研制了评价软件，借助软件开展 应用研究

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Crassus structural belt in Tarim basin, Xinjiang
新疆塔里木盆地克拉苏构造带

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: 软件还集成了储量、 产量和效益常用评价方法，主要是产量预测的动态分析方法和数值模拟方法， 形成不同开发阶段气田推荐方法列表

The software also integrates common evaluation methods of reserves, production and benefit, mainly dynamic analysis method and numerical simulation method of production prediction, and forms a list of recommended methods for gas fields in different development stages

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The proven developed gas field in KLS structural belt is only gas field A, with reported proven geological reserves of 2830 × 10 and recoverable reserves of 2130 × 10. The gas reservoir types belong to medium porosity and medium permeability, bottom water, abnormal high pressure and dry gas reservoir. It was put into production on November 19th, 2004, and all wells were drilled by the end of 2006, reaching the capacity scale of 107 × 10 designed by the scheme.
KLS构造带内探明已开发气田只有气田Ａ， 上报探明地质储量2830×10⁸，可采储量2130×10⁸，气藏类型属于中孔中渗、 底水、 异常高压、 干气气藏。２００４年１１ 月１９日投产， ２００６年底所有井完钻， 并达到方案设计的107×10⁸ 产能规模。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: The traps to be drilled are implemented, so the resource conversion rate method is used to predict the trend of new reserves. Historically, the conversion rate of resources in and around the tectonic zone is between 50% and 55%. Taking history as a reference, the reliability limit of resource quantity evaluation, that is, floating up and down by 30%, is taken as the probability interval, and the probability curve function adopts normal distribution
待钻圈闭落实， 因此采用资源转化率法对新增储量趋势进行预测。 历史上，构造带内及周围资源转化率集中于５０％-５５％之间， 以历史为参考， 同时以资 源量评价的可靠程度界限， 即上下浮动３０％， 作为概率区间， 概率曲线函数釆用正态分布

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 陆家亮. 天然气开发规划风险量化评价模型研究. (2014)
陆家亮. 天然气开发规划风险量化评价模型研究. (2014)

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.; Documentation: The review of the documentation was performed by Ecobilan and is in compliance with ISO 14040 and 14044. The data set documentation is correct in view of the appropriateness of the information provided. It includes all relevant information in view of data quality and scope of application of the respective LCI result.

exchange.generalComment: 内部收益率集中于28%-34%，全生命周期经济效益风险较小
